rooms.name: Entrance Hall & Lobby
rooms.description: A spacious entry area that sets the tone for the Brutalist design with robust concrete textures.

rooms.name: Living Area
rooms.description: An open-plan living space integrated with a kitchen. Features exposed concrete and industrial finishes aligning with Brutalist aesthetics while maintaining comfortable living standards.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Open-plan kitchen adjoining the living area, designed for both functionality and style in a modern urban setting.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Seamlessly integrated dining space within the open-plan layout, promoting family interaction.

rooms.name: Wardrobe/Closet
rooms.description: Functional storage space adjacent to the living area for easy access and organization.

rooms.name: Guest Toilet
rooms.description: A compact guest toilet designed with efficient use of space.

openings.description: A robust concrete door aligning with the Brutalist aesthetic.
Large windows offering ample natural light and enhancing the open-plan feel.
Provides access to a private balcony designed for relaxation and fresh air.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and a private balcony emphasizing comfort and functionality.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom designed for short stays, maintaining the Brutalist aesthetic with minimalistic finishes.

rooms.name: En-suite Bathroom
rooms.description: Integrated bathroom for the master bedroom offering privacy and functionality.

rooms.name: Service Area
rooms.description: A dedicated space housing water closets and storage, ensuring efficient service routing in accordance with Vastu principles.

openings.description: A robust internal staircase providing access between floors, designed with structural integrity in mind.
Large window facilitating natural light and aligning with Vastu by maximizing energy flow.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: A dedicated area featuring a swimming pool with surrounding concrete slabs and seating for relaxation.
